attributes.action: take the lead in urging Parliament  to  abolish all expenses,other than travel,for M.P's and immediately commission the Senior Salaries Review Body to review and suggest new incremental salary scales for M.P's, Ministers and Opposition Spokespersons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In order to salvage and restore the reputation of Parliament the issue of M.P's expenses must be sorted out immediately.
The current situation is damaging this country, damaging  respect for Parliament and damaging mainstream political parties.
An independent review should establish new salary scales for M.P's, Ministers and Opposition Spokesperson which would include a fixed sum for out of London M.P.'s accommodation expenses.
A review of expenses applicable in the House of Lords should also be initiated.
Put pride back into our political system, implement new rules and enforce the rules rigidly.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
